name: Diminutive Fire Crab
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the fire crab or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The diminutive fire crab makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
